Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima soared through the air. It was natural, in a way, for her to be 
flying. It was something she did for millions of years.

As the ground sped past her below, her optics caught site of a craft as she 
neared the Predacon base. 

Landing a few miles upon a ridge, she watched the craft, then her optics 
turned back to the base to observe. A pity that she still didn't have her old 
form. She would be able to scan all that was going on, & with her stealth 
form, get closer. 

But for now... she was upon the ridge, observing. Waiting for her ... 
victum.. prey... this.. Hydras. 

--part1_bb.2d7b1171.2b734822_boundary
